titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: OCCUPATION CODE (CLINICAL SPECIALTY) - Description

body.p: OCCUPATION CODE (CLINICAL SPECIALTY) is the same as attribute NHS OCCUPATION CODE .
OCCUPATION CODE (CLINICAL SPECIALTY) Â is the primary (main) specialty NHS OCCUPATION CODE of a doctor or dentist.
The medical and dental specialty NHS OCCUPATION CODES are currently used exclusively for National Workforce and Electronic_Staff_Record purposes.
Note: these codes are not the same as those used for MAIN SPECIALTY CODE .
